project_path.GorillaDiamond: contracts/GorillaDiamond Full Smart Contract Security Audit/GorillaDiamond

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if the excluded addresses list is too long.
